text: Giannutri is a small island in the Mediterranean Sea off the coast of Tuscany, Italy. It is the most southern island of the Tuscan Archipelago. Its tourist attractions include Villa Domizia, an ancient Roman seaside villa. == Gallery == File:Giannutri Spalmatoi.jpg|Giannutri Spalmatoi gulf, with the Giglio Island behind File:Giannutri_coast.jpg|Giannutri coast File:Giannutri_runway.jpg|Giannutri disused runway File:Giannutri- Il faro.jpg|Giannutri lighthouse Category:Islands of Italy Category:Province of Livorno
title: Giannutri
